analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/5/0x39e962ec8a7eedfb2604f8aa28a7948062805ca5.sol:
	Contract VoiceCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0x39e962ec8a7eedfb2604f8aa28a7948062805ca5.sol#212)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/5/0x39e962ec8a7eedfb2604f8aa28a7948062805ca5.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/5/0x39e962ec8a7eedfb2604f8aa28a7948062805ca5.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/5/0x39e962ec8a7eedfb2604f8aa28a7948062805ca5.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
